instruction: Transform the list of ingredients into an easy to read recipe
output: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat and add garlic, onion, and tomato. Cook for 3 minutes until ingredients are soft. Add the rice and cook for another 5 minutes until the rice is lightly browned. Add a pinch of salt and 4 cups of water. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer for 10-15 minutes until the rice is cooked through. Enjoy!
